Maybe ownership has changed or something, but service-wise, this place is heinous. And that is saying something when it comes to Barcelona service. Aside from clueless waitstaff, the food was boring with poor presentation. A crotchety old waiter admonished my girlfriend because she did not eat all of the bland pork skewer she was served. Go here for a large plate of mediocrity served by someone unmotivated to please.
